name: Demise (Winnitude!)
description:
A game made in a week, by one guy, for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

A rerelease as a full game may be coming with a Zombies mode and more maps, but the fate of the project is ultimately unknown.

FEATURES:

  •  Advanced Movement  - Accelerated  Backhopping, Bunny Hopping, Grappling Hooks, Rocket Jumping, Ledge-Climbing
  • Multiple Weapons
  • 2 Levels
  • Fast-Paced FPS Combat
  • Occasionally High-Quality Graphics
  • It's kind of like DOOM, but not nearly as good.
  • Holes
  • An observable decline in the programmer's sanity
  • Help me

CONTROLS

  • P to Pause
  • X to Use
  • Space to Jump
  • Left Click to shoot
  • E to grapple
  • R to reload
  • Scroll Wheel to switch weapons

ATTRIBUTION
